Texts.Chs: 啊，一杯热乎乎的软糖毛毛雨正是我需要加满圣代的东西。
Texts.Eng: Ah, a hot fudge drizzle is just what I need to top off my sundae.

Texts.Chs: 所有你最喜欢的冰淇淋配料——还有一些！
Texts.Eng: All your favorite ice cream toppings - and then some!

Texts.Chs: 我可以在冰淇淋上放些吉米。
Texts.Eng: I could do with some jimmies on my ice cream.

Texts.Chs: 我想我会按原样吃冰淇淋。毕竟，厨师认为他们的菜不完整是不礼貌的。
Texts.Eng: I'll eat my ice cream as is, I think. It's rude to the chef to consider their dish incomplete, after all.

Texts.Chs: 我会把所有东西都装上一点！粘虫和花生酱应该放在一起，对吧？
Texts.Eng: I'll load up on a little of everything! Gummy worms and peanut butter should be fine together, right?

Texts.Chs: 叶族人的冰淇淋没什么好吃的吗？没有烤肉酱？
Texts.Eng: Nothing sssavory for Floran's ice cream? No barbecue sssauce?

Texts.Chs: 哦！他们甚至有鸟嘴状的面包屑配料！
Texts.Eng: Oh! They even have beakseed crumb toppings!

Texts.Chs: 我应该按原样吃冰淇淋，还是再加些别的？决定，决定...
Texts.Eng: Should I eat my ice cream as is, or top it off with something else? Decisions, decisions...
